title: An Act bringing the crime of leaving the scene of personal injury causing death within the jurisdiction of the district court

abstracts.abstract: By Representative Lipper-Garabedian of Melrose, a petition (accompanied by bill, House, No. 1846) of Kate Lipper-Garabedian and Middlesex District Attorney Marian Ryan for legislation to bring the crime of leaving the scene of personal injury causing death within the jurisdiction of the district court.  The Judiciary.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on The Judiciary
Hearing scheduled for 11/04/2025 from 01:00 PM-05:00 PM in A-1

Hearing rescheduled to 11/04/2025 from 01:00 PM-02:30 PM in A-1                                                                                                                       and Virtual Hearing updated to New End Time
